DataElement.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Ordered Repeats OMOP CDM Refill Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another._Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something._Make or do or perform again._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification._The number of refills after the initial prescription. The initial prescription is not counted, values start with 0.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Order Repeat
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another._Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager._Executed and carried through to completion._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something._Make or do or perform again.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Protocol Agent Transfer Administration Performed Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.:The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial.
The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.
Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something.:Make or do or perform again.

Concepts.definition: The act of requesting that a person, business, or organization do or supply something.
Make or do or perform again.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created manually based on BRIDG 5.1 for CDM. 8.27.18 mc modified Property concepts to  reflect BRIDG 5.3.1 definition dw 11-8-2019. Released DW 12-2-2020

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The number of refills after the initial prescription. The initial prescription is not counted, values start with 0.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.origin: PCORNet CDM:The Patient-Centered Outcomes Research Network Common Data Model

DataElement.origin: OMOP CDM:The Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model
DataElement.changeDescription: Based on CDMH BRIDG 5.0.2 and OMOP value set for CDM. Modified CDE name to better reflect BRIDG definition and Property name
